name: SGL 2.0 (Classic)
description: This is a modified version of spybotor's 'Startpage Google Look'. Alignment problem has been resolved, no ads, white navbar, images embedded for enhanced privacy! 3.0 (AIR)
additional_info: _____________________________________________________________________ UPDATE 06/24/15: SGL 3.0 (AIR) for startpage's new design can be found here. _____________________________________________________________________ UPDATE 06/07/15: To continue using this classic style: 1) Switch the StartPage theme to Air (Classic) 2) Edit domain in the style(s) from ("startpage.com") to ("classic.startpage.com") 3) This should be changed on both SGL 2.0 & 3.0 UPDATE 11/18/13: Override 2.0 to 3.0 Special thanks to grom for optimizing the .CSS code! Special thanks to Barbiegirl for solving alignment problem.
